Reviews.Title: Pulsating Night Vision; Choppy Audio
Reviews.Author: Fish "Fish"
Reviews.Content: The night vision feature on this monitor is pretty bad - about every five seconds, you get a flash of bright white on the screen.  We tried the unit in several locations so we know it's not interference.Next, the audio is choppy.  The unit is supposed to pick up noise at the "casual conversation" level but it chops in and out at that level.  The only way to get the audio to keep coming through is to make a LOT of CONSTANT noise.  A short, loud noise would not be picked up.  I could hear the baby crying through the walls before I could hear her through the monitor.Also - there's a "VOX" feature that supposedly turns the monitor on and off when noise is picked up.  That feature is VERY slow to kick in at the onset of crying or room noise.If you want to hear 100% of what's going on in the room, this monitor simply won't do it.FWIW, the video is very clear and the audio, when it actually comes through from time to time, was crystal clear.  That's why I 2-starred it instead of 1-star.  Still crummy.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Decent
Reviews.Author: G. almonte
Reviews.Content: We chose this monitor over the Mobi Cam and Summer Infant because the frequency would not infere with the phones, etc.  So far no interference at all with any of the wireless gadgets in our home.  The picture is pretty decent-it's not as clear as the advertised picture but then again no monitor has a picture clear crisp color picture.  The night vision is also pretty good.  The volume is clear with no interference.  The night light lullaby is a cute added bonus.  So far-we gave it four stars-the only thing all these cameras monitor need to improve, is a clear crisp picture only then will we give it a five star rating.

Reviews.Title: Inability to monitor audio only
Reviews.Author: R. Carlson
Reviews.Content: There is no way to have the audio on throughout the night and the screen off.  This is a basic feature of most other monitors.  The VOX feature is not sensitive enough and not adjustable.  I returned this product.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: A. Scarlatos
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. Wish I had it for my other 2 kids. Sound does cut out if there in no crying, would be nice if one had the option to have sound on all the time and it would be beneficial if this was mentioned in the manual or if tech support new about it. It would have saved a return/exchange for a new one. Anyway the sound going out if there is no crying turns out being a good thing. The magnetic stand is useless when using power supply due to the wait of the filter on the power cord. All i care about though is knowing my baby is safe without having to sneak up on him all the time.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Work Without It
Reviews.Author: J. Redmond
Reviews.Content: I just got this product today and it is already awesome! All I had to do was plug in and wait til the handset was fully charged, then I turned on both camera and handset and it synced automatically by itself. Before receiving the monitor I was worried by some of the reviews. The quality is GREAT! I am not saying you can see every single particle but I can see everything that needs to be seen. Quality is great and the night vision works awesome! Every little noise made is heard loud and clear and also shows up with lights on the handset. From the handset you can turn on different lullabies. No you cannot turn the nighlight feature on from the monitor but for me there is no complaint there. You can adjust the picture on the monitor darker or lighter. Being able to charge both camera and handset is great, no constantly running through batteries. Also from reading other reviews people said there was a delay in video and it froze, I have no delay but of maybe half a second and the picture does not freeze. My baby will not sleep unless she is in someones arms or a deep sleep. I cannot leave her by herself so when I need to do homework I have to wait for someone to hold her. Tonight alone I have been able to do my homework and she has slept peacefully with me watching the whole time. This is the best monitor for me. If you do not require such things do not worry but for those who want to view and hear their child as well as they can without being in the room this is the monitor for you! Five stars all around! Truly for me is something I do not know how I have lived without for these past 5 weeks!

Reviews.Title: Very reliable product, love it!
Reviews.Author: Inaya Bazzi "I.B"
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor for my sister's new baby. My sister loves it, it is static free, loves the music, love everything about it. Clear picture at night, you can turn on the music from the handset. The battery lasts for ever. My sister said that if anyone asks what she wants for a gift, she would want another one for her handicapped children. She even shows people the baby from the monitor instead of bringing her out. Thanks for the technology and this helpful item.

Reviews.Title: Great Product......difficult to arrange camera
Reviews.Author: A. Pienta "cmusptmed"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product after returning a different video monitor after only hours!  This monitor is great!  The only negative that I have is that the camera clamp mount does not work on my crib because the slats are too wide and we do not have a shelf nearby.  I currently have it mounted to his mobile since he is not standing yet, but will have to rig up another setup here soon.  I will probably have to cut a 2x4 piece of wood to mount the camera to behind the crib. The lullaby feature actually worked for my little guy.....he was fussing and I turned it on and he fell right to sleep!  The small hand held camera receiver is great and very mobile.  This product has given a great piece if mind and lowers the stress level.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!  So worth the $$!!
Reviews.Author: Maiya's Mommy
Reviews.Content: Great item.  Very easy to set up, and great picture quality!The only drawback I see is that the screen self adjusts for lighting every few seconds, and if you have it on in a dark room, you get a little bit of strobe effect - its negligible, but if you're highly sensitive to light, you might be annoyed.  I sometimes turn it off at night unless I'm awake to watch it - baby TV, is awesome!!Overall, I couldn't be happier with anything else!

Reviews.Title: A great monitor, very clear
Reviews.Author: Leah Caesar
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor based on the good reviews and its' sleek style.  It didn't disappoint me at all, the picture is very clear.  Also it's easy to hook up and use.  As the user manual says, you can't really use regular batteries as the batteries only last four hours. We don't have any complain just one wish for the product: I wish it has a "talk back" function through the monitor.  I can hear the sound from my boy, but I can't talk back to him.  (But I haven't seen any other monitor has this function.)

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: R. Craig
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best purchase i have made! I bought this monitor when my baby was 6 months old, and my only regret is not buying it sooner! My husband and I could never get my son to sleep through the night because at his first peep we would have to go in his room to check on him and we would awaken him by opening his door. When I got this product I was able to check on him without going into his room. I was able to see that he was just whining with his eyes closed and would fall right back to sleep himself! Now we all get the rest we need! I highly reccomend this product for any parent!

Reviews.Title: Levan Babyview  Review
Reviews.Author: RPG "R"
Reviews.Content: This is the best monitor ever.  I wish I had this when she was a baby. Works really well at night. Love the night vision..You just have to get use to the lights that are on the video monitor while sleeping. Works great in two different floors.  Vox feture is great, comes on when noise or movement in the room.  really like this product.I would recomend.

Reviews.Title: Good value for price
Reviews.Author: NABuyer
Reviews.Content: I haven't had my baby yet so I may be speaking prematurely but from our little tests it seems to work well. Night vision is pretty clear and I can't imagine needing anything more than what this product provides. Our house is pretty big and we can get signal from one end to another but not much more than that. I would recommend it for the money. If you have 300 to spend you may find better but the additional value it would provide is probably quite small.

Reviews.Title: Levana BabyView20, great product
Reviews.Author: G. Goldstein
Reviews.Content: We've had a previous remote baby monitor but it had interference problems and poor black and white video.  This product is fantastic!  Clear color reception in a 2 story home with wireless phones and wifi up and running.  Also like the ability to squelch the low-level noise in the baby's room from a fan; it sends the audio only when it senses an audible change in baby's room.  Highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great, reliable and simple product
Reviews.Author: S. Farshchi
Reviews.Content: Bought it to monitor a patient room's from a next floor up. Very easy to set up and get going. The picture is very good and the product functions exactly as advertised. It is great to see and hear what's going on as the product scan rate is frequent and very clear. We have been using it for the past month or so with no issues. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Jacquelin A. Declue
Reviews.Content: What a great monitor.  We originally bought the Summer Infant Day & Night Handheld Color Video Monitor, but returned it due to the constant static.  We also could see two other children in the neighborhood on the Summer monitor....scary!  The BabyView is amazing and I would recommend to anyone who wants to keep a close eye on their baby!

Reviews.Title: Did not work for me
Reviews.Author: D. Byrne
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd video baby monitor and I was not impressed by it. I do have to say it was interferance free unlike the 1st monitor I ordered but the picture was awful. It was pixelated and when the night vision was one you could hardly see anything. Not very clear. Also the camera and the hand held device would disconnect from each other or all of a sudden I could see the picture somewhat but the sound would disappear. I did send it back to the company for a refund and they were very quick about refunding my money. That was nice!

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Francine R. Moreira "Fran M"
Reviews.Content: It is really good, just to set up was tricky, the main thing that i had to do was not on the manual, I almost returned. But when I called the customer service, they told me that I had to press 2 buttons at the same time to connect the 2 parts together. The Manufacture should fix the manual, they know that the main part of the connection is not whritten there, the customer service apologize for it. After that I just have a peace of mind to go in the basement to do laundry or even go out side of the house and still watching my sweet baby girl.

Reviews.Title: The monitor FAILED in 2 weeks!!!
Reviews.Author: Oke "AntiguaCAT"
Reviews.Content: This thing is a piece of trash! I would give it a zero if I could. Within 2 weeks of setting it up, the monitor displayed a bright circle which obscured any view of the baby. All attempts to remedy the image problem were unsuccessful. Turning the brightness down had no effect. The most annoying thing was that this was a Christmas present and it was not set up by our son until late January - after the baby was born. That meant that the return period of 30 days had expired and we could not return the item for a refund. Buy with caution or better still, buy a different monitor.

Reviews.Title: Not compatible
Reviews.Author: DS in MN
Reviews.Content: If you are using a wireless router, forget about it!  This is the response I received from the company when asking why my wireless goes dead when I turn the monitor on:"The only thing I can recommend that you try is to adjust the wireless channel in your router's setup. Some routers allow you to do this whereas other do not, so you would have to refer to the router's manual to do this."

Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: David Gray
Reviews.Content: This monitor is perfect so long as you do not need to either hear your babies or to view them.The audio only picks up above a certain threshold -- one that is lower than regular conversation.  There is no way to adjust this.  So, this monitor is essentially a video only monitor.If you do not have a secure location to mount the unit, you are screwed. The EMI shields on the power cords for the camera and the handset render them completely useless when not on battery power.  The ferrite core on the handset power cord will pull it off of whatever counter you put it on.  The viewing angle is wrong for best viewing (it won't stand upright, and is at just enough of an angle to be very hard to view).  The screen refreshes or something every second and gives a pulse of light each second -- very annoying at night.  Finally, the magnetic base for the camera will not hold both the camera and the power cord ferrite core -- so you cannot really use the stand when you are plugged in.There is a worthless feature of playing a melody that is controlled by the handset -- worthless.I would not recommend this product to someone I was angry with.  Trash.

Reviews.Title: Volume - Major Issue
Reviews.Author: KNJ18
Reviews.Content: I returned this after one night of use.  The video screen will only go on when it detects some type of audio.  The factory settings for the type of audio it has to detect for it to turn on the video can not be adjusted.  It says its preset to pick up casual conversation but it wasnt sensitive enough to here our kid when he sat up and was talking... We tested it out ourselve and discovered it just wastn sensitive enough.  I called and there is no way to change the preset or to just have audio on all the time.  Returned it, trying the Summer Slim that looks like a cell phone, that one can have the audio on all the time if you would like.

Reviews.Title: Broke twice in six months
Reviews.Author: A mazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We have had this monitor for approximately 6 months.  It has now broken twice.  The first time, the power cord wouldn't work, so we contacted the company for a replacement.  It took TWO WEEKS for them to send a replacement part.  I had to go to Radio Shack to buy a universal power cord and adapter--do they really think two weeks is a reasonable amount of time to have a BABY monitor out of commission?  Now, it is just completely dead. It is not worth the amount of money they are charging, if it doesn't work in the middle of night when you are worried about your baby.  Company is now saying it will take THREE WEEKS to repair.  And I have to pay to ship it back to them.  And be without a monitor for those three weeks.  This is a product that is necessary and needs to be reliable.  This product is not reliable and their customer service is lousy.

Reviews.Title: Horrible range
Reviews.Author: J. McKenzie
Reviews.Content: My wife bought this video monitor after a former co-worker of mine lost her baby to asphyxiation in his crib.  This monitor is not nearly worth the money.The audio is spotty.  I had to keep hitting Vox and turning it off to reactivate the audio.  But even worse, the range is pathetic.  It claims to have a 450 foot range... well, someone slipped in a zero where it doesn't belong.  The effective range was closer to 45 feet.  Even after re-synching up the device, I lost signal about 50 feet from the camera.  Don't buy this monitor unless you live in a one bedroom apartment.

Reviews.Title: Good for what it's supposed to be/do
Reviews.Author: error
Reviews.Content: Let me just start out here by first saying I'll be reviewing this product as a baby monitor, and nothing more; hence, I will not be making unfair comparisons to my high definition camcorder or a professional security system.Yes, the video isn't that great.  But for monitoring the child it's good enough, the video quality can get grainy, especially during the night vision part, but what do you expect?  The whole point is not to make out if there is dust floating around, but to watch the child.  So in that sense, this monitor does what it sets out to do.Audio is good, suprisingly better than I expected.  However, the audio (music) it can play, well, is just an extra that really is unnecessary.The camera itself is pretty well built and sturdy enough to handle minor bumps and scrapes, so you can put it just about anywhere and rotate into the position you need.From a purely functional perspective as to what this product is (a baby monitor), and what it sets out to do (monitor the child), this is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Thoughtful, Convenient Design. Few Minor Flaws.
Reviews.Author: P. Colin McGraw "AV, Computer & EnviroTech Nut"
Reviews.Content: You can tell Levana put a lot of thought into this webcam-quality video monitor's design. The long-lasting lithium ion battery in the handset runs strong where a cheaper NiMH battery would have failed. There's a belt clip on the back of the handset that conveniently rotates to become a stand to set for when you set the unit down. The "VOX" feature switches the unit off until your baby makes noise, conserving power. The "night vision" comes on automatically when it gets dark, making the feature effortless to use, and the button you press on the handset to start a lullaby actually put our baby to sleep after she started stirring (which wins the BABYVIEW20 HUGE bonus points).Still, a few minor issues keep it from being completely perfect. The magnetic base prevents the camera from being angled too far downward if positioned above the crib (though the crib mount works great), the weights on the power cord near the plug-in points of the devices sometimes end up tugging the units out of position, the lullaby you initiate with the handset keeps going until manual stoppage WITH said handset (no way to stop the music on the camera if you leave the handset behind) and the camera only picks up noises from several feet away, so you have to make sure you position it near your baby.All in all, the Levana BABYVIEW20 is an outstanding product, and highly recommended if you are in the market for a video baby monitor. The thoughtful design and convenient featureset are more than enough to offset its few flaws and earn a reputation of quality.Also, see my "customer images" (under the product images section of the main product page) for a demonstration of the effective range and image quality of night view for the unit.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Monique Marques Ribeiro Lucci
Reviews.Content: It works very well, looks nice and we can hear everything our baby does. In my apartment there is no interference and no errors.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: KayElle
Reviews.Content: For a baby monitor that cost this much I expected better.  It works fine, but gets an awful lot of static for "interference free" and goes "out of range" quite often when we have the receiver in the living room.  Our house is not big!  I'm ok with how this works and it gets the job done, but if I had to do it again I would spend less.

Reviews.Title: Three rooms of distance, and it lost the signal
Reviews.Author: German Paredes
Reviews.Content: CONS: Three rooms of distance, and it lost the signal. Welive in a small apartment, and suddenly, FREEZE THE IMAGE, for all night long, we don't trust in the monitor, and we turn on and of every hour = DistressPROS: Music plays smooth and nice, and brightness is nice!

Reviews.Title: moniter
Reviews.Author: R. Eileen Cassell
Reviews.Content: they were amazed, and loved it, they could go to kitchen or bathroom and just in the yard and watch the baby. wonderful

Reviews.Title: Simple to use
Reviews.Author: Denise Ramalho
Reviews.Content: I researched the product and was impressed by the positive feedback it received. The Levana monitor works wonderfully. It allows me to check in on my sleeping son while I'm watching TV in another room. One minor note is that there is about a half-second latency, but no big deal. I could give this product a 5 stars, but will be a bit lenient and give it a 5, since I have not tested it So far every day, just few days for test. My due date is for July 30. :)

Reviews.Title: For My Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Brian Finn
Reviews.Content: I did some research before buying this model.  I liked the features and the reviews were solid.  My daughter loves it!!

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor, clear sound with no interference from electrical items.
Reviews.Author: Selliot11
Reviews.Content: This monitor works very nice. I love the ability to check on my grandaughter while I'm around the house. Only dislike is when attaching the portable viewer it's easy to accidentally bump the button that starts the music. I love the swivel stand that turns in to a pocket clip and that I can turn the music on as a short distraction when I'm on my way to her.

Reviews.Title: Great Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Echi
Reviews.Content: Great Baby monitor. Simple and effective.It is Practical, economic, reliable. I would recommend it to my friends.Thanks ShopTronics

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it! Works great,  and I love the lullabies! Very comforting.  I would recommend it to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: messes with my internet
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: We have only been using this a few nights and the lights that indicate the volume have stopped working consistently.  Now they blink on and off even when there is consistent sounds in the room.  Any time the monitor is on both my phone and tablet have spotty internet reception but if it is off I don't have a problem.  The combination of these problems is making me consider looking for a new monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal for the Price
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were able to purchase this baby monitor through one of the Amazon daily deals. The price was great, under $80. The monitor is clear and the set-up of the system was really flawless. My only complaint is that this particular monitor doesn't have a zoom option. Since you have to mount these at least three feet from the crib, being able to zoom would be a nice option.Nonetheless, for the price we paid and the options provided, it's a solid deal.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it!
Reviews.Author: richard hukill
Reviews.Content: I thought I would love this product but instead it became a problem. The first night was great, as I have never had a video monitor before. the second night the hand held would go in and out saying "out of range". A week went by and then the screen went white and did not come back on. Don't Buy this item !!!!!

Reviews.Title: Poor Customer Service & Product Support
Reviews.Author: Leeann
Reviews.Content: I received this monitor as a gift, though a friend had recommended it previously.  After 2 months of use, the monitor simply stopped working and would no longer power on.  Upon calling Levana I was instructed to send the unit back for evaluation and was sent a shipping label.  The helpfulness ended there.  I was quoted a 3-4 week turnaround time to receive a replacement monitor.  The only way to do it faster would have been to pay for a new one to be shipped to me and then receive a refund if/when the original was found to be defective.After 3 weeks I hadn't heard anything and called the company to check on the status of the replacement.  I was told that the monitor had just been tested and the replacement would ship out that day and I should receive it within a week.  When I received the replacement monitor, the box had been opened, indicating that it was a refurbished monitor.  I plugged it in and there was a constant humming/buzzing coming from the monitor that had not been present on the previous one.  I called the company (CWD) back, went through the troubleshooting steps with the representative on the phone, and was told to send it back.  I went through the exact same process again with the same 3 week wait time before calling to check on the status.  When I called, I was told that the monitor would ship out that very same day (which seems like you need to call the company to remind them that they are supposed to be shipping something to you.  I find it hard to believe that it is a coincidence that I happened to call twice, about two separate monitors, and just happened to be lucky enough to call on the day that each shipped out). I was also informed that they found nothing wrong with the monitor, no humming noise or anything, and that they were shipping the same one back to me.  After explaining that this was unacceptable and that the 2 months without a monitor was a complete inconvenience, they still sent the same monitor back to me and asked me to test it out in a neighbor or friend's house to see if the issue was interference.  I'm not sure exactly what that would solve, considering I don't live in those houses, and the first monitor did not have an intereference issue in my own house.I contacted Amazon and they honored a return even though it was well past their 30 day advertised policy.  Amazon was incredibly supportive and professional, but I will never buy a Levana product again.  Their customer service was horrible.

Reviews.Title: As far as monitors go...
Reviews.Author: sara
Reviews.Content: This one is ok. It's patchy sound and unclear quality make for frustrating scenarios sometimes but seeing as how we got it for a good deal on cyber Monday it was worth it. Otherwise I probably would have returned it. It doesn't come with the ability to wall mount either which is something we needed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for our usage
Reviews.Author: Chi Tsao
Reviews.Content: We are usng it to monitor the baby and other things, and it gives exactly what we want to see day and night.

Reviews.Title: franky
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: only 5m away through two walls，the Signal off and on 。everything else is good。i like it 。。

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: liliken
Reviews.Content: This monitor is easy to use, has a clear picture and long range.  It was recommended by someone who had one, and it delivers everything promised.

Reviews.Title: Works well. Does what I need it to do.
Reviews.Author: leap year mommy
Reviews.Content: I have had this monitor since August of 2012. It was the same a friend of mine was using and she liked it, so I gave it a try.This has been the first and only baby monitor I have purchased and I really like it. My daughter is on the opposite side of the house so having this has been extremely helpful.I leave It charging during the day so is ready at night. What I like about it is that it turns on when the baby stirs, coughs, etc. Otherwise the screen is turned off. The button on the left, when pressed, gives you a live view of the baby. I love the night time feature in which I can see the baby in BW. What I have used the most is the lullabies. Sometimes my daughter stirs and I turn on the music from the handheld monitor and I can watch her go back to sleep. It can play one song or random which is the one I use. I don't like that the music is a little bit loud in her room, but at least is blocking out any other noises around her preventing her from going to sleep.Sometimes, the monitor goes out of range (don't know why) but it usually fixes itself up. Another small issue I have had is that sometimes the picture is so dark on the handheld monitor that I have had to go in the room and turn off/on the camera for it to reset.Those are the only issues I have had. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase.EDITED June 2014- The monitor stopped working all together. I thought it was the battery, so I ordered a new one. It didn't work. I contacted customer service and they didn't offer any assistance because I was out of warranty. They offered me a $5.00 discount on another purchase...So I will be shopping for another camera...from another company.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Gina Denise Garcia
Reviews.Content: It does the job, but nothing special. Goes " out of range" sometimes even though we are 20 feet away. It was a good price, so no huge complaints.

Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: stan golden
Reviews.Content: where do i even begin? this baby monitor is not safe, that's where. our infant sleeps one level directly above us and well within the 150  foot range advertised. we have had several nights waking up to a monitor with video on but the sound off, or at best breaking up constantly (try to sleep with intermittent white noise, i dare you). so we would have an infant kicking and screaming but when you're asleep, you don't get to see this activity but rely on the sound to wake you; worthless. the camera also completely blacks out from time to time, meaning we can hear (sometimes) our infant but the screen is black. it requires turning off the camera several times until it 'reboots' itself and works; worthless. the VOX function, which is supposed to allow the battery rest while monitoring the infant and bringing the video and sound back to the monitor if sound is detected. this function doesn't work at all. never; worthless. upon attempting the 'live chat' function on the Levana website, i was told to return the monitor and have one of their technicians spend some time checking it and either repair or replace (2-4 weeks). when i requested a replacement sent immediately, i was told i had to purchase it until the defective one was ruled defective. the chat session lasted more than 30 minutes, with each customer service response coming around 3-5 minutes after mine; so, yes, customer service: worthless.when it comes to something as important as infant safety and adult sleep, don't waist your time or money with this worthless product. spend more money and get a better product; this is indeed one purchase no one should skimp on. after much advice, i've purchased the samsung safeview and am hoping for a much better experience than this one, which was worthless.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor
Reviews.Author: S. Benson
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good video monitor for a decent price. The camera is pretty clear most of the time. Occasionally it gets kind of fuzzy when the room gets darker or lighter (something with the night vision sensors), but for the most part it is good. The microphone is a little sensitive (our heat turning on gets picked up), but I don't think it's an issue. Would be nice if there was an option to just have the sound turn on when it picks something up and not the whole video screen because that can be a little annoying when you're trying to sleep, but it's not that bad.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Norm Reggi
Reviews.Content: The monitor was a little smaller than expected but all in all it does the job that was expected a

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price, wish it had longer range
Reviews.Author: Bridget "Bridget"
Reviews.Content: This works well in the bedroom area alone, however if I take it much further like the kitchen it's a no go. Same as outside.  I like that it plays music to help,little one get to sleep. Being able to see an active climbing toddler before he makes his escape out of the crib is very handy.  Overall I would recommend this to others if less than $100.

Reviews.Title: Great video, perfect functionality
Reviews.Author: Crickle
Reviews.Content: I had read a couple reviews regarding the video going out on this after only a year, and we've only had it a month or so right now, but the video quality, night vision, sound and range are great. There's no static noise, I love the power save feature and without fail it pops on as soon as they make a loud enough peep, but not just for any old household creak or the radiators steaming on. So far we're very pleased with this monitor! I wish I knew if I could add multiple cameras or monitor pieces, but the monitor is very easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Love this baby monitor!
Reviews.Author: Jane A Huffman
Reviews.Content: My husband and I give this monitor five stars because we love the extra features like the nightlight and music options for our baby. We also love the belt clip so it is easy to carry around the house. We haven't had it very long, but the sound and video quality seem great so far! We are happy with the product and would recommend it to others looking for a nice video monitor.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: peter hansen
Reviews.Content: DOES THE JOB, ADDED SENSE OF SECURITY AND USE IS INTUITIVE. WOULD BE NICE IF THE MAGNETIC BASE COULD MOUNT TO THE WALL AND HOLD THE CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Quality is not there
Reviews.Author: Chad A. Perrino
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is absolutely horrible it is very grainy even if you only 10 feet away from this thing screen size is on the small size very snowy try to adjust with no luck returned it same-day

Reviews.Title: Does the trick!
Reviews.Author: Ken ciesla
Reviews.Content: Love being able to see what exactly my baby's up to. The camera allows many different views with the magnet backing. I can get a full view of the crib this way! The only problem is a quick flash every couple seconds. I just ignore it. Many would be annoyed though.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: KHarville
Reviews.Content: I feel much better about my child sleeping in another room now with this monitor. It works great and is simple to use.

Reviews.Title: I love this monitor.
Reviews.Author: Jabari M. Jones "Pissed Shopper"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I purchased this monitor for our new baby and it works great. We can still see him whether the lights are on or off and the music plays very clear, as well. The night light on the monitor is not very bright at all, but, otherwise, we have no complaints thus far. Great monitor to be able to see and hear your baby. My wife loves it!

Reviews.Title: Great design, performance and price
Reviews.Author: Walter A.
Reviews.Content: This is one of those products that just delivers, period!Good range (even with obstructions), nice resolution (day aor night camera modes) and great cost/benefit.Look no further.

Reviews.Title: Great basic monitor
Reviews.Author: Kendrick Currie
Reviews.Content: Found this on lightning deal. Was good entry level monitor with everything we needed. Great for basic needs. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Very usable, worth the price I paid
Reviews.Author: El Supremo
Reviews.Content: Works as expected.  Sharp, clear color in good room lighting, degrading to somewhat grainy (but usable) black-and white in darkness.  Wireless link was strong throughout the house.  While the camera module can work on batteries (AAA, not supplied, but the portable monitor comes with a replaceable Li-ion battery), the working life is less than 5 hours, so using it with the supplied AC adapter is pretty much required.  For the Black Friday price I got it for, definitely worth it.  Dimming range on the monitor could be better.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Spolomis
Reviews.Content: I can see my baby perfectly even in the dark because of the night vision. It was easy set up. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Very with it!
Reviews.Author: sara
Reviews.Content: Amazing product. Very good video quality. Highly recommend this product. I have bought several and this is by far the best!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, great price!
Reviews.Author: Iris Guerra
Reviews.Content: This monitor is easy to set up, has a clear enough picture, and great sound quality. It is also a very cute color and was able to blend in to the decor in our baby's room. The night vision could use improvement, but it does its job. Also wouldn't mind a bit bigger screen. All in all, it was a great buy! Awesome deal!

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Yih Jong Chen
Reviews.Content: Levana Babyview20 is a good baby monitor.  It's doesn't have fancy features (wifi connectivity or camara zooming).  But those things aren't necessary.  Babyview20 allows you to see and hear your baby while he/she is sleeping.  This will keep them safe.  For the price, this is a good product.  The only thing I wish it had is some crib mounting hardware as the standard mount isn't easy to setup on a crib.

Reviews.Title: I really like it!
Reviews.Author: zhiwei zhai
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to set up and the picture is clear. It is a good baby monitor. My wife and I both like it!

Reviews.Title: Nice baby gift!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ondrea Cobb
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her new monitor. Clear pic and the comfort of seeing her new baby when a noise is heard.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor for Price
Reviews.Author: Farrah Garcia
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this monitor if your looking for a reasonably priced monitor. I do feel that this monitor does everything it says it will. It appears durable and we have had no problems when it has been dropped. The signal has worked great all over our house and we have a 3600 sq ft house. The picture is clear and I love waking up and seeing my baby on the screen. I can tell if his eyes are closed or if he is smiling. The night vision works great and I feel very secure sleeping knowing this monitor is working. The battery only last 3-4 hours so it has to be plugged in all night. The screen is slightly small but I knew that going into it with the price. Their is no volume control for the music that you can play and that would be a nice feature. There is no place to hang it on the wall so that makes it a little tough to get it to see in the crib. The biggest negative I have is you have to have it pretty close to the crib to get a really good picture. However, its does what we need it to do and the monitor is easy to take with me through out the house. We have been very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: A great relief
Reviews.Author: Misty Sperling
Reviews.Content: I got the baby view to monitor my 8 month old while he was sleeping so I could move around the house doing chores.  I was so relieved to  finally have something to view my baby's movements as well as hear him perfectly.  I get a clear connection all the time!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Charles K Haase
Reviews.Content: Monitor works great. Basically exactly what we expected for the price. No complaints thus far. Video is pretty clear and sound comes through well.

Reviews.Title: Haven't owned it long but have had no problems
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: We bought this on an amazon lightening deal so you couldn't beat the price.  I had planned on moving my older child's video monitor to our new baby's room and getting a cheep monitor to have in case he is sick since his room is far from ours.  But I couldn't resist the deal we got.  I can't attest to how it works as we've only had it out of the box for a few weeks but I like the night light feature and that you could control lullabies from the monitor.

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed with quality or performance.
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: Very cheaply built.  Almost looks like a demo/floor model.  Very poor color quality even in full light.  Thoroughly not impressed.

Reviews.Title: We Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: It's an amazing monitor. Great clarity both audio and video. The night light and music options are awesome. Night vision works great even with a night light on. Only complaint is occasionally at random the receiver losses signal even if it doesn't get moved from where it had been sitting. Other then that it's amazing and we love i

Reviews.Title: excellent quality and value
Reviews.Author: JZ
Reviews.Content: so far this baby monitor has extremely clear picture even the night view at night vision is clear the sound quality is impeccable and the lullabies and additional night light make an excellent add onsI'm planning on ordering a second for our other child

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: choe

Reviews.Title: Going Back
Reviews.Author: M. Chernysh "Mommy"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to like this but it's going back. I already have a Foscam monitor for my older child but I wanted one that I could have a separate handset for my baby. This monitor does not work well for us. The night vision, while it allows you to see the baby just fine, tries to compensate constantly causing the monitor to flash every few seconds. This is very disturbing to a light sleeper. Additionally, if you use the VOX with the sound on, the monitor beeps every time it detects movement.Another note on the VOX is it is useless if you use a loudish fan like we do. We use the fan to help drown out noise in our baby's room but this fan sets off the sensor leaving the monitor on or beeping on every few seconds.My baby's room is next to mine and I still constantly get the "out of range" notification. If you use a cell phone near it, forget it.  I like the idea of the magnetic base but it does not seem to function as it's supposed to. Throughout the night, it would shift slightly and make it so that I couldn't see my baby at all. I would prefer if it had an attached base and even better, remote tilt/pan feature.Some positives: I actually do like the lullaby feature. However, I can use my iPod with the same effect.  I also appreciate the nightlight since my baby still wakes throughout the night and it's nice to be able to see without turning any lights on. Again, this can easily be achieved with a nightlight.Unfortunately, I am sending this monitor back and going back to my trusted Foscam.

Reviews.Title: **Very happy with this monitor, it simply works. I would definitely recommend this to anyone**
Reviews.Author: Jared Wall
Reviews.Content: First of all, I looked at several baby monitors before deciding on this one. It seems like there were no good reviews out there so I felt like I would just take a gamble and pick one to give it a chance. Luckily, this monitor was exactly what we were looking for. I can look at my baby from anywhere in the house and know that she's safely sleeping in her room. It gives great peace of mind.The video monitor shows plenty of detail during the daylight hours and during the night with the night vision. I can tell if the baby has dropped her pacifier or not.The audio is good as well through the monitor.We rarely use the lullaby option, but it's nice every now and then.The "sleep" mode is nice to use during the night. The monitor will "wake up" when the baby makes a sound. Sometimes it does "wake up" when a loud truck drives by, but the monitor is doing its job, so I can't complain about that.Overall we are very happy with this monitor and it simply works. We would definitely recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Levana Babyview camera is a good fit
Reviews.Author: Andrew Stout
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good camera, with about the easiest installation/setup possible. The battery life is outstanding. There only seem to be three drawbacks.First, the screen is quite small, and the IR is fairly grainy compared to the previous Lorex we had.Second, though it claims it is interference free, it does randomly cut out at times. When it happens, it's only for a second, shows an error connecting message, and pops right back. Sometimes it goes for a whole night without issue, other times it could happen about 6-10 times.Third, the hassle free VOX setting is nice, and works very well. A little too well. It's very sensitive, and will pick up low tones easily like a truck or train passing, or bass sounds from a different room. Better to be too sensitive than the other way around I guess. But it would be nice if it was able to be customized or adjusted.Other than those 3 things, it is an outstanding camera, and well worth it for the low price.

Reviews.Title: Nice but had some quality issues
Reviews.Author: jbooks
Reviews.Content: I was given this monitor as a gift before the birth of our first child. We originally really loved this monitor and it worked great for about 6 months before we started having issues.Cons:f you bump it or drop it at all, which is inevitable with a toddler it will break. We dropped it once and the plastic case covering the antennae broke off leaving the image somewhat blurry. Also, after about 6 months the hand held device no longer worked unless it was plugged in. I tried to contact customer service about replacing the ion battery but was unable to get ahold of anyone.This only happened 2-3 times over the course of using it every night for 2 years, but a few times it just shut off in the middle of the night even though it was plugged in and fully charged. We are lucky we woke up to our child without the monitor.Pros:We never got an intercepted signal with a neighborStandby mode allows you to sleep, and the monitor only goes off if there is a change in noise. It blocks out white noise such as music or a fan which is AMAZING! Most monitors do not do this, normally whatever is playing in your baby's room is also playing on the monitor.  This feature shuts off the monitor's screen and audio. It will only turn back on when your child starts to cry or make noise. You will be immediately notified on the monitor you when your child starts to cry -- the LCD and audio will switch on. Seriously, this is almost worth the price of buying one just for your sanity's sake. You don't have to have the bright light of the monitor on all night and you don't have to listen to your child's music.Great night vision and a really great sized screenThere are built in night lights and songs, but I never used these.The camera itself rotates around so you can get the best view possible.Overall I think it was a pretty good product, but it did not last as long as I would have liked it to. We are now on our second baby and ended up having to purchase another monitor because this one just wasn't reliable enough for a newborn.
